entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Îles-de-la-Madeleine
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:36 AM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Îles de la Madeleine Airport 10:00 AM ADT Monday 13 March 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: -0.6°C

Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -2.6°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 4.
